title: options and preferences
content: None of my drop down menu's show options or preferences . The other solutions I have read usually say go to options first but I don't have this. Clicking the 3 bars on the right hand side does not show them. Ultimately I am trying to get my unread emails to list in bold.

title: Thunderbird not showing the pop-up for a few seconds showing incoming email details
content:
I have ver 128.0.1 and I cannot get it to show the details of an incoming email for a few seconds. Where will I find the setting for this? I found such a setting, set it for 4 seconds and nothig is shown when an email arrives.

What am I doing wrong?

Thanks

title: CONTA DE EMAIL EXCLUÍDA FICA PEDINDO CREDENCIAIS DE ACESSO
content:
Olá, boa noite!

Eu excluí uma conta de email do Thunderbird, porém, de 5 em 5 minutos fica aparecendo a solicitação eu colocar as credenciais dessa conta para acessá-la novamente, conforme imagem em anexo.

Já procurei em tudo quanto é canto e não achei uma forma de parar com isso, se puderem me auxiliar agradeço!
creator: diogo3

title: Change of my email address

title: New Message Body Text Font Size Default Setting under Windows 10
content:
Greetings, 

      I find the default body text font size for message composition to be too small. I can enlarge it by pressing control+ several times which solves the issue for the current session but the new setting is not saved as a default. The text size always keeps reverting back to tiny at the start of the next session. 
     I have made numerous attempts to change the default message composition body text font size via advanced settings. So far I have not found an option that does the job. 
    Thanks in advance for any help!

TMA
creator: tma.7ta
